verbs.description: [ARG1: Donald Trump ’s statements and tweets] [V: are] [ARG2: dangerous for us all] [ARGM-ADV: in terms of foreign policy] , and they can also backfire in his own face , as may happen in the case of the three - judge 9th Circuit Court of Appeals panel that is mulling the January injunction ...
